metadata.tikz_options:
node distance = 2cm and 4cm,
    box/.style = {
        rectangle,
        rounded corners,
        draw=red!80,
        fill=red!10,
        text width=5cm,
        minimum height=2cm,
        align=center,
        font=\sffamily\small
    },
    arrow/.style = {
        ->,
        thick,
        red!50,
        >=stealth
    }

nodes.label: Onboarding\\\small\textit{Introduction to Red Cross Mission and Values
Basic First Aid\\\small\textit{Basic lifesaving techniques and CPR
Volunteer Code of Conduct\\\small\textit{Understanding roles, responsibilities, and ethical guidelines
Emergency Response Training\\\small\textit{Disaster response and safety procedures
Psychological First Aid\\\small\textit{Providing emotional support in crises
Specialized Training\\\small\textit{Specific training based on volunteer's role
Continuing Education\\\small\textit{Ongoing learning and skill enhancement
Leadership Training\\\small\textit{Cultivating leadership and team management skills
Community Engagement\\\small\textit{Building relationships and outreach activities
